theorem.name: app_cons

text.english: Inductive case of app: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l1, l2 \in L_A . \; app(a :: l1,\; l2) = a :: app(l1,\; l2) \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo app: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l1, l2 \in L_A . \; app(a :: l1,\; l2) = a :: app(l1,\; l2) \]

theorem.coq:
Lemma app_cons : forall a : A , forall l1 l2 : list, app (a :: l1) l2 = a :: app l1 l2.
Proof.
Admitted.
